p: Human and animal health has to face changes in the ecology of pathogens resulting from globalization and climate warming. Flaviviruses represent one of these emerging challenges and are currently spreading worldwide, as exemplified by the recent pandemic of Zika virus ( Saiz et al., 2016) and the increasing outbreaks of WNV ( Martin-Acebes and Saiz, 2012; Munoz et al., 2018). Therefore, development of efficient vaccines to control them is an urgent need.
